Option.Title: Ah, ok, thank you for explaining.

DialogText:
Well, sometimes the great powers do not quite align as they should so things may fall out of place.  My job is to record all the happenings of Middle-earth and help travellers any time I find something that could potentially cause them trouble with their adventures.

Some things I can do are fixing the story you are a part of (reload the quest book), recover a lost tome of knowledge (give a new quest book), help you when friends have become foe or vice versa (reset certain factions), and in some cases even set you on the correct path (fix a broken quest or continue a quest if an update breaks things).

If it is really needed, I can, one time, present you with supplies to help you on your way (set starting inventory if needed).
